result.execSummary:
The defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Criminal Damage to Property, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez in custody.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Sentencing proceeded.   Statements made as to sentencing.   
AS TO COUNTS 1 AND 2:  
Court ordered defendant to serve 80 days in the House of Correction concurrent, with 80 days credit for time served.  TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.
Court ordered applicable costs, fees and surcharges to be paid by 10/4/18.  Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment.
Pretrial Incarceration Credit received and filed.
By Agreement of the Parties,  matter is RESCHEDULED to 04-04-2017 at 01:30 pm.  sdg
TURNOVER TO JUSTICEPOINT FOR RELEASE.  UPON RELEASE BAIL TO REVERT TO $250.00 PR BOND.

Defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez in custody.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Hearing proceeded on the Record.  Court went off the Record to hold Sidebar in Chambers.  Hearing continued on the Record.  Court held colloquy with the Defendant.  COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT TURNED OVER TO JUSTICEPOINT FOR RELEASE.  UPON RELEASE BAIL TO REVERT TO $250.00 PR BOND.  COURT MAY WAIVE DEFENDANT'S APPEARANCE AT THE NEXT DATE.  Review hearing scheduled for March 28, 2017 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez in custody.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Prior to matter being called on the Record,  case was Staffed in Chambers.  Hearing proceeded on the Record.  Court held colloquy with the Defendant.  Defendant to be Assessed TODAY (02-14-2017).  Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Review.  Review hearing scheduled for February 21, 2017 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez in custody.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Hearing proceeded on the Record.  Defense advised that Defendant will follow through with treatment options.  Defendant has been in custody and unable to meet with the Day Reporting Center.  Court held colloquy with the Defendant.  Court went off the Record to hold Sidebar in Chambers.  Hearing continued on the Record.  Defendant to be Assessed.  Court cautioned Defendant regarding honesty and the Assessment.  Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Review.  DEFENDANT IS REMANDED PENDING THE NEXT DATE.  Review hearing scheduled for 02-14-2017 at 08:30 am.
Vacate Judgment.  Cash bail to remain in full force and effect.

Defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez in custody.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Hearing proceeded on the Record.  State advised that matter should be Staffed.  Defense advised that Defendant is interested in continuing the DPA.  Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Review.  Review hearing scheduled for February 6, 2017 at 10:00 am.
Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Level 7 Supervision/court reminders. DEFENDANT to be monitored by drug testing.

Defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez in court with attorney Brian Burke.  Defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez in custody.  Karl Peter Hayes appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT.  Scheduling conference scheduled for January 30, 2017 at 08:30 am.
WCS.  Filed, sdg.

Attorney Richard E. Thomey in court.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Hearing proceeded on the Record.  Attorney Thomey UNSUCCESSFULLY attempted to contact the Defendant.  Case is already in Warrant Status.  No further action taken at this time.
WCS.  Filed, sdg.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez not in court.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Attorney Thomey was notified of this hearing.  Defendant failing to comply with the DPA, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  NO BAIL IS FORFEITED.
WCS.  Filed, sdg.

Defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez in court with attorney Richard E. Thomey.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Hearing proceeded on the Record.  Court held colloquy with the Defendant.  Defense advised that the Defendant is motivated to complete the DPA.  Defendant to complete Letter of Apology as well as TWENTY (2) HOURS of Community Service.   Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Review.  Review hearing scheduled for November 14, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez in court with attorney Richard E. Thomey.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

As to Counts 1 & 2:
The parties have agreed to a deferred judgment agreement.The defendant was advised of his constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, pled GUILTY and was examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionaire/Wiaver of Rights and Addendum to Plea Questionaire received and filed.  The parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis for the plea.  The Court found the defendant guilty but WITHHELD entry of Judgement of Conviction.  The Court reviewed the Intake Requirement and Further Conditions with the defendant.  The court approved the Deferred Prosecution Agreement and ordered the proceedings suspended for a period of six months. 


  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for October 3, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez in court with attorney Richard E. Thomey.  Jennifer Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: sm
Case in court for Deferred prosecution agreement hearing, however, defense request an adjournment. Case calendared in branch 47.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for August 29, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez in court with attorney Richard E. Thomey.  Katherine M Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea/dpah  in Branch 47  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for July 26, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant advised No Contact Order remains in full force and effect.  Defendant to have no contact with Lisandra F., Kiara R., the address of 2013 Miller Park Way, West Milwaukee, WI.  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services "Court Reminders."  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez in court with attorney Joel H. Rosenthal.  Defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez in custody.  William T. Berens appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Siefert, Branch 47.  Scheduling conference scheduled for June 10, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant; Original in file. ($250.00 signature bond) gj
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Richard E. Thomey in court.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Lisandra F., Kiara R., and 2013 Miller Park Way, West Milwaukee, WI
  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez in court with attorney Vincent Paul Guimont.  Defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez in custody.  Chad Wozniak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Siefert, Branch 47.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 3, 2016 at 08:30 am.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Luis Manuel Ramos-Perez not in court.  Hanna Ritchie Kolberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.  State's motion for Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from the Clerk of Circuit Court's Office is granted by the Court.  Court makes finding that there is a possible victim identified, therefore, Court stays order of forfeiture with recompense to be determined at close of case.vb
